traits.locale_text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 0, барк 1.

languages.text: "Внимание всему экипажу — на борт "Бессердечного" пожаловали арбитры! Окажем им подобающий прием!"
"Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"
languages.original_text: "Внимание всему экипажу — на борт "Бессердечного" пожаловали арбитры! Окажем им подобающий прием!"

traits.locale_text: "Attention all crew, the arbitrators have come aboard the Heartless! Let's give them a proper welcome!"
"Attention all crew, the arbitrators have come aboard the Heartless! Let's give them a proper welcome!"
"Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have boarded the Heartless! Let's give them a proper welcome!"
"Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have boarded the Heartless! Let's give them a proper welcome!"
"Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"
"Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"

languages.text: "Achtung, Crew: die Arbitratoren sind auf der Heartless zu uns gestoßen! Heißen wir sie angemessen willkommen!"
languages.original_text: "Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"

traits.locale_text: "Achtung, Crew: die Arbitratoren sind auf der Heartless zu uns gestoßen! Heißen wir sie angemessen willkommen!"

languages.text: « Avis à tout l'équipage : des arbitrators nous ont rejoints à bord du Sans-Cœur ! Accueillons-les comme il se doit ! »
languages.original_text: "Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"

traits.locale_text: « Avis à tout l'équipage : des arbitrators nous ont rejoints à bord du Sans-Cœur ! Accueillons-les comme il se doit ! »

languages.text: «¡A toda la tripulación, los Arbitrator han abordado la Desalmada! ¡Vamos a darles la bienvenida que merecen!».
languages.original_text: "Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"

traits.locale_text: «¡A toda la tripulación, los Arbitrator han abordado la Desalmada! ¡Vamos a darles la bienvenida que merecen!».

languages.text: “全体船员注意，那些法务官已经登上无心号了！咱们来好好欢迎欢迎他们吧！”
languages.original_text: "Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"

traits.locale_text: “全体船员注意，那些法务官已经登上无心号了！咱们来好好欢迎欢迎他们吧！”

languages.text: 「全クルーに告ぐ。アービトレイターがハートレスに乗艦した！奴らを手荒く歓迎してやろう！」
languages.original_text: "Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"

traits.locale_text: 「全クルーに告ぐ。アービトレイターがハートレスに乗艦した！奴らを手荒く歓迎してやろう！」

languages.text: "Mürettebat, dikkat! Yargıcılar, Kalpsiz'i ziyarete gelmiş! Onları layığıyla ağırlayalım!"
languages.original_text: "Attention all crew, the Arbitrators have joined us aboard the Heartless! Let us give them a proper welcome!"

traits.locale_text: "Mürettebat, dikkat! Yargıcılar, Kalpsiz'i ziyarete gelmiş! Onları layığıyla ağırlayalım!"
